captions.text: -So you catch them and drop them. -Yeah, I got it.
(Laughing)
(laughing)
Ten...
Nine... Eight...
Seven...
Six... five... four...
Three... two...
One...
Lift it forward and you catch in your legs.
Now bring your leg back up and catch with your hands.
F**k you...
Uuugghhh!!! F**k you! (laughter)
Hey, Dee. I just wanna like tell you that uhh..
You mean a lot to everyone that's here. Umm... Happy Birthday. Umm...
Dee Just askshmarmdrghm... I wanna be a fire fighter.
-I was like I'm going to be lawyer. -I wanna get in a fight with fire.
And I'm going to have a black lab.
I will go buy ummm... Hanes t-shirts... that I will rub around my hands.
They won't burn that f**k quickly.
If I knew what being a lawyer... like what... when I was back.
Listen!!! I will kick the fire's ass.
Guaranteed.
Final Round!
Goooldman... dolphin cop!
One thing I didn't even taken into consideration when we were doing this is how f**king hung over I'd be the day after.
I feel pretty good, I slept really, really well.
My head hurts, my body hurts.
I have like a cut on my leg and I have no idea how I got it...Oh my God! haha.
I woke up this morning and remembered that I had parked my car in a tow away zone and the car got towed.
Any thing else you want to add? Don't do drugs kids?
Yeah, that's a good one.
So I, uh... I think no matter what.. enjoy everything in moderation.
and ahh... don't get to a point where you're being an idiot.
Because... as you can see it really really sucks either way.

comments.text:
You definitely have talent in making videos -- bravo!   For the future, 
however, to show your range, try other subject areas.  I say this because 
there many, many videos on YouTube with the same subject.  You want to 
distinguish yourself from the rest.﻿

comments.text:
Bullshit propaganda from weed smokers. This test is totally BS because 
cannabis works differently than alcohol. The tests clearly prefered 
Cannabis. Of course it is harder to do sport if you're fucking drunk. But I 
never had a headache or whatsoever the morning after, you just shouldn't 
drink too much. The amount this guy has drunken would equal more than just 
a joint or 2. If you take too much cannabis you start to get panic attacks, 
etc. and I bet this guy would've been sitting there, sweating and screaming 
around with as many joints as the other guy had beers.﻿

He's not an alcoholic but if he was, then he should have shown himself 
waking up in his own piss and vomit because that's what most alcoholics do 
on a regular basis. That's what they hide from everyone else, how many 
mattresses and couches and carpets they've pissed away into a stank and 
replaced. NEVER happens with weed. Alcohol is BY FAR, the worst drug ever. 
Some strains of weed, usually the stronger Indicas make SOME people a bit 
paranoid because it makes their dumb asses RELAX and it's only when you 
learn HOW TO RELAX that you learn how to do ANYTHING correctly, including 
THINKING correctly, that is OUTSIDE THE BOX, and thinking outside the box 
and lifting the veil of bullshit from what you've been told about the world 
and how it functions and discovering to what extent you've been lied to 
scares the shit out of people.﻿

comments.text:
You all have to look at the safety precautions too. Some people can't 
handle weed at all. They can have a bad trip from it, have a heart attack 
(if they have heart problems) and die. Also I wouldn't want to live next to 
someone in an apartment who smokes weed and have it go through a hole in 
the wall or something and get either my kid high or me high if I'm doing 
something productive. With alcohol people can't get drunk off of it in the 
air with weed you can slightly. So therefore that's the other reasons why 
they don't make it legal guaranteed. If anyone does not have anything nice 
to say about this then don't waste your time commenting. It'll do you no 
good.﻿
